summary: A low-life scumbag gets kidnapped by a mysterious gang and put through inhumane training to become a mole inside the police force.
cast: Kang Shin-il|Jong-Hyuk Lee|Tae-young Yoon|Rae-won Kim|Oh Kwang-rok|Cheol-min Park|Yoon Seo Hyun|Park Sung-Woong
keywords: police funeral|police officer stabbed|police officer killed|police officer
title: Miseuteo Sokeurateseu
